home.title: Hello I'm,
home.description: I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development

about.title: A little about myself:
about.description: Hello, my name is Thalis Viana Zambarda!
about.paragraph1: I've been passionate about technology since I was a teenager, and I ended up studying Technology in analysis and systems development at IFSUL, where I got even more involved with programming in extracurricular projects.
about.paragraph2: Driven by this passion, I learned the React.js Node.js and Typescript stack mainly with RocketSeat content and ended up getting a job on a front-end project during the pandemic where I developed my soft and hard skills.
about.paragraph3: I worked mainly with React.js in the development of dashboards and Node.js in the creation of rest api, both technologies used in conjunction with JavaScript.

experience.description2: Mediation of online learning: new educational possibilities supported by digital technologies
experience.description3: Disruptive educational practice: investigating renewing possibilities of teaching and learning processes in education and technologies
